item.title: Netflix reportedly closes in on Warner Bros deal
item.description: The streaming giant has emerged as the top bidder ahead of rivals Comcast and Paramount Skydance, reports say.

item.title: Trump hails 'historic' peace deal between DR Congo and Rwanda
item.description: The US president hopes that a peace deal will pave the way for greater American investment in the resource-rich region.

item.title: Germany votes to bring back voluntary military service programme for 18-year-olds
item.description: The shift in its approach to its military follows a push to create Europe's strongest conventional army.

item.title: Kenya signs landmark health deal with US despite data fears
item.description: Kenya becomes the first African country to secure US health funding since cuts to foreign aid by Trump.

item.title: India travel chaos worsens as IndiGo cancels hundreds of flights
item.description: IndiGo, India's largest carrier, has said operations will return to full normalcy only by 10 February.
